title: Collaborative Research Task Design and Social Sector Practical Competencies Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Social sector practical research task design and collaborative learning competency enhancement program for working professionals. Conducting project-based assessments using digital environments

learning_goals: Through collaborative consulting, learners can clearly define research objectives and evaluation criteria.
Learners verify the structural validity of research tasks by collaborating with library professionals (information literacy instructors).

Learners will select one public policy case and complete a three-stage research task (information collection → data analysis → policy proposal writing), submitting results meeting ≥4 of 5 checklist items per stage.

Learners will develop one social science educational task reflecting a research-revision process (planning-collection-analysis-reconstruction) using digital tools (Google Docs, Padlet) and revise/improve it ≥3 times based on peer evaluations and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
